metadata.name: Cats in Motion #1
metadata.description:
Do you hear the roar of the tiny tiger? 

Cats in Motion is an ongoing series that is meant to capture the heart and spirit of the felines I care for in the woods of Ohio. With these video pieces, my intention is to showcase the true beauty that these cats exude on a daily basis through every movement, action, and facial expression they make.

Each piece in this series features music written and recorded by ME. Everything you see and hear was created by myself! I've been a musician for nearly a decade so I knew I had to eventually incorporate the music side of things with the visual art eventually.

This is Tiger. A truly striking little maine coon kitty, who's quickly become one of my absolute favorite cats. With her bright eyes and fluffy thick coat, she truly looks like a lil beast straight out of a fantasy world. Her feistiness is unmatched, just as much as the unconditional love she has for me. She loves to follow me whenever I take a walk through the woods, she's almost always by my side, as long as she isn't playing with toys or sleeping in her fancy cat bed.
